messages.content: write me an email explaining to my college counselor that naviance never sent me an email and it didn't go through.

Dear [College Counselor's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am contacting you today to bring to your attention an issue I encountered with Naviance, specifically regarding an email communication that I believe did not successfully go through.

Recently, I was expecting to receive an email from Naviance, but unfortunately, it seems that I never received it. I wanted to inform you about this situation as it may have implications for our ongoing correspondence and any necessary actions related to my college applications.

I have checked my email inbox thoroughly, including spam and trash folders, but no email from Naviance regarding [specify the subject or purpose of the email] was found. As a result, I am concerned that there might have been a technical glitch or an error during the email sending process.

Considering the importance of efficient communication during college application season, I thought it best to clarify this matter promptly. I kindly request your assistance in ensuring that I receive any necessary information or updates related to my applications through alternative means until this issue is resolved.

Please let me know if there is any additional information I can provide to help resolve this matter swiftly. I appreciate your attention and understanding regarding this situation and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Thank you for your continuous support and guidance throughout this college application process.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

Dear [College Counselor's Name],

I hope you're doing well. I wanted to reach out regarding an issue I encountered with Naviance. It seems that I never received an email from them, and I wanted to let you know.

I've checked my email thoroughly, including spam and trash folders, but I couldn't find any email from Naviance regarding [specify the subject or purpose of the email]. I'm not sure if there was a technical problem or if the email simply didn't go through.

Since this is college application season, I wanted to make sure you were aware of the situation. It's important for us to stay in touch and for me to receive any necessary information or updates regarding my applications.

I would really appreciate it if you could assist me in finding alternative ways to receive important information until this issue with Naviance is resolved.

If there's any additional information you need from me, please don't hesitate to ask. Thank you for your understanding and assistance in addressing this matter.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

interactionPattern.rationale: The human is seeking advice on how to write an email, and the AI is providing that advice.

powerDynamics.rationale: The human is leading the conversation by giving instructions and feedback to the AI.

evidence: I hope this email finds you well.
emotionalTone.rationale: The conversation is focused on a professional task (writing an email) and the language used is formal and business-like.

engagementStyle.rationale: The AI is reacting to the human's requests without adding new topics or directions.

evidence: I hope this email finds you well.
knowledgeExchange.rationale: The AI is sharing its skill of writing professional emails.

conversationPurpose.rationale: The purpose of the conversation is to solve the human's problem of needing to write an email.

topicDepth.rationale: The conversation is brief and focused on a single task.

turnTaking.rationale: Both the human and the AI contribute to the conversation, with the AI providing lengthy responses to the human's prompts.

humanRole.rationale: The human is primarily seeking information (how to write an email) and directing the AI's actions.

evidence.quote: I hope this email finds you well.

aiRole.rationale: The AI is primarily acting as an expert, providing a detailed email draft, and also as an advisor, adjusting its advice based on the human's feedback.
